welcome.text: Pando provides a set of decentralized protocols and Web3 tools to help developers build their own applications.
welcome.text.botastic: Use Botastic, the universal AI platform, to build your own AI apps.
welcome.text.defi: All DeFi protocols are built on Pando Network, which is a sidechain of Mixin Network. Explore Mixin Developer docs or our guide for details.
welcome.text.talkee: Talkee is a Web3 commenting and chat tool with Ethereum Login & Wallets. Enable your website or webapp into a Web3 community.
welcome.title: Welcome to Pando Developer Console
